_tutorial.info: This file contains all the products for your store. The 'slug' is now automatically generated from the 'name' field.
how_to_add_a_new_product: 1. Copy an existing product block (from the opening '{' to the closing '}').
2. Paste it at the end of the list, just before the closing ']' bracket.
3. Change the values for the new product:
- 'name': The product's title. The URL slug will be auto-generated from this.
- 'price': The product price, as a whole number (no decimals).
- 'description': A short description for product lists.
- 'longDescription': A more detailed description for the product page. This is optional.
- 'specifications': A list of key-value pairs for product specs. This is optional. Add or remove as needed.
- 'category': An array of category slugs this product belongs to (e.g., ["men", "new-arrivals"]). This MUST exactly match slugs from categories.json.
- 'image': The URL for the main product image. Use a placeholder like 'https://placehold.co/600x600'.
- 'additionalImages': A list of URLs for more product images. Can be empty [].
- 'stock': The number of items in stock. Set to 0 for 'Out of Stock'.

products.name: Cyber-Circuit Hoodie
products.description: A stylish hoodie with a futuristic cyber-circuit design.
products.longDescription: Embrace the future of fashion with the Cyber-Circuit Hoodie. This piece features an intricate, glowing circuit pattern that's sure to turn heads. Made from a premium cotton-poly blend, it offers both comfort and a standout aesthetic, perfect for navigating the urban jungle day or night.

products.name: Neon Racer Jacket
products.description: Sleek, aerodynamic jacket inspired by cyberpunk racers.
products.longDescription: Feel the speed with the Neon Racer Jacket. Its water-resistant shell and streamlined fit are designed for life in the fast lane. Reflective detailing ensures you stay visible, while the bold neon accents provide a striking visual signature.

products.name: Cityscape Dream Dress
products.description: An elegant dress featuring a print of a twilight cityscape.
products.longDescription: The Cityscape Dream Dress captures the magic of the city at dusk. Its flowing silhouette and soft, breathable fabric make it perfect for any occasion, from a casual outing to a formal event. The unique print is a work of art, depicting a serene urban landscape under a sky of clouds.

products.name: Kitten-Blossom Tee
products.description: A charming t-shirt with a kitten and flower design.
products.longDescription: Add a touch of sweetness to your wardrobe with the Kitten-Blossom Tee. Made from 100% organic cotton, this shirt is incredibly soft and comfortable. The adorable graphic of a kitten surrounded by flowers is screen-printed with eco-friendly inks.

products.name: Rainy Day Umbrella Top
products.description: A stylish top perfect for a quiet, rainy day aesthetic.
products.longDescription: Inspired by peaceful, rainy afternoons, this top features a subtle yet beautiful design. The soft-touch fabric drapes elegantly, providing a comfortable and flattering fit. It's the perfect piece for those who appreciate understated beauty and cozy vibes.

products.name: Metropolis Glare Sunglasses
products.description: High-tech sunglasses for the modern urbanite.
products.longDescription: Navigate the concrete jungle with the Metropolis Glare Sunglasses. Featuring polarized lenses and a lightweight frame, they offer superior protection and comfort. The cyberpunk-inspired design is both functional and fashionable, making them a statement accessory.

products.name: Cosmic Voyager Backpack
products.description: A durable backpack with a stunning cosmic print.
products.longDescription: Carry your world in the Cosmic Voyager Backpack. Its spacious main compartment and multiple pockets keep you organized, while the padded laptop sleeve protects your tech. The vibrant cosmic print is inspired by distant galaxies, making it a truly unique accessory.

products.name: Pixelated Hero Kids Tee
products.description: A fun, retro-gaming inspired t-shirt for kids.
products.longDescription: Level up your child's style with the Pixelated Hero Kids Tee. This comfortable cotton shirt features a colorful, pixel-art design that celebrates the golden age of gaming. It's perfect for school, play, and everything in between.

products.name: Urban Grid Leggings
products.description: High-performance leggings with a sleek urban grid pattern.
products.longDescription: Conquer your workout or your day with the Urban Grid Leggings. The four-way stretch fabric provides ultimate flexibility and support, while the moisture-wicking technology keeps you cool and dry. The subtle grid pattern adds a touch of modern, architectural style.

products.name: Digital Nomad Watch
products.description: A minimalist watch for the modern professional.
products.longDescription: The Digital Nomad Watch combines classic design with smart features. Its clean, analog face is complemented by a discreet notification system that syncs with your phone. Crafted from stainless steel and sapphire crystal, this watch is built to last.

products.name: Skyline Serenity Scarf
products.description: A soft, lightweight scarf with an artistic skyline print.
products.longDescription: Wrap yourself in the beauty of the city with the Skyline Serenity Scarf. Made from a luxurious modal fabric, it's incredibly soft and drapes beautifully. The abstract skyline print is versatile enough to complement both casual and formal outfits.

products.name: Stealth Bomber Jacket
products.description: A minimalist, all-black bomber jacket.
products.longDescription: The Stealth Bomber Jacket is the epitome of understated cool. Its clean lines, matte black finish, and premium hardware create a sophisticated and versatile piece. Perfect for layering, it can be dressed up or down with ease.

products.name: Galactic Gazer Cap
products.description: A classic baseball cap with an embroidered galaxy patch.
products.longDescription: Top off your look with the Galactic Gazer Cap. This comfortable, adjustable cap is made from durable cotton twill and features a beautifully detailed embroidered patch of a swirling galaxy, inspiring you to look up and dream big.

products.name: Raindrop Melodies Blouse
products.description: A chic blouse with a subtle, abstract raindrop pattern.
products.longDescription: Find beauty in the quiet moments with the Raindrop Melodies Blouse. The sophisticated pattern and silky-smooth fabric create a piece that is both elegant and comfortable. Perfect for the office or a dinner out, it's a versatile addition to any wardrobe.

products.name: Railroad Dreams Denim Shirt
products.description: A rugged denim shirt for a timeless, adventurous look.
products.longDescription: Inspired by classic workwear, the Railroad Dreams Denim Shirt is built to last. Made from sturdy, high-quality denim, it features reinforced stitching and pearl snap buttons. It's a versatile piece that gets better with every wear, telling its own story over time.

products.name: Chromatic Flow Sneakers
products.description: Lightweight sneakers with a vibrant, flowing color design.
products.longDescription: Step into a world of color with the Chromatic Flow Sneakers. The breathable knit upper provides a sock-like fit, while the responsive foam sole offers all-day comfort. The eye-catching design features a seamless gradient of colors, making every step a statement.

products.name: Future-Noir Trench Coat
products.description: A modern take on the classic trench coat, with a cyberpunk twist.
products.longDescription: Redefine your outerwear with the Future-Noir Trench Coat. This piece combines the timeless silhouette of a trench with futuristic details like asymmetric zippers and a high-tech, water-repellent fabric. It's the ultimate statement coat for the style-conscious individual.

products.name: Starlight Glimmer Dress
products.description: A dazzling dress with subtle, shimmering threads.
products.longDescription: Shine bright at your next event with the Starlight Glimmer Dress. Woven with delicate metallic threads, this dress catches the light with every movement, creating a magical, starlit effect. The elegant cut and comfortable lining ensure you feel as good as you look.

products.name: Aura Kids' Raincoat
products.description: A magical, color-changing raincoat for kids.
products.longDescription: Make rainy days fun with the Aura Kids' Raincoat. This amazing coat is made from a special fabric that reveals a colorful pattern when it gets wet! It's fully waterproof and has a soft lining, keeping your little one dry and comfortable during their adventures.

products.name: Neo-Tokyo Joggers
products.description: Comfortable and stylish joggers with a futuristic edge.
products.longDescription: The Neo-Tokyo Joggers blend comfort and style seamlessly. Made from a premium fleece-backed fabric, they are perfect for lounging or exploring the city. Tech-inspired details like sealed pockets and reflective drawstrings set them apart from the ordinary.

products.name: Zero-G Floating Shelves
products.description: Sleek, minimalist shelves that appear to float on your wall.
products.longDescription: Display your favorite items with the Zero-G Floating Shelves. Their invisible mounting system creates a clean, modern look, making your books and decor the center of attention. Crafted from solid oak, they are both beautiful and strong.

products.name: Oracle Code Beanie
products.description: A soft, warm beanie with a subtle code-inspired pattern.
products.longDescription: Keep warm and look smart with the Oracle Code Beanie. The jacquard-knit pattern is inspired by falling matrix code, offering a nod to geek culture in a stylish, understated way. Made from a soft acrylic blend, it's comfortable and non-itchy.

products.name: Nebula-Patterned Skirt
products.description: A flowing skirt with a vibrant nebula print.
products.longDescription: Get lost in space with the Nebula-Patterned Skirt. The lightweight, chiffon-like fabric flows beautifully with every step, and the stunning nebula print is rich with color. It features a comfortable elastic waistband and is fully lined.

products.name: Dusk Till Dawn Smart Lamp
products.description: A smart lamp that mimics natural light from dawn to dusk.
products.longDescription: Improve your sleep and wake cycles with the Dusk Till Dawn Smart Lamp. It simulates the natural progression of sunlight, from a soft dawn glow to a warm evening sunset. Controlled via an app, you can customize schedules, colors, and brightness to create the perfect ambiance.

products.name: Solitude Graphic Novel
products.description: A beautifully illustrated story of solitude and discovery.
products.longDescription: 'Solitude' is a stunning, wordless graphic novel that follows a lone traveler on a journey through breathtaking landscapes. The intricate illustrations and emotional storytelling make it a profound reading experience for all ages.

products.name: Urban Explorer Utility Vest
products.description: A functional and stylish utility vest with multiple pockets.
products.longDescription: The Urban Explorer Utility Vest is the perfect blend of form and function. With its numerous pockets, it's ideal for photographers, travelers, or anyone who needs to keep their essentials close at hand. The durable yet lightweight fabric ensures comfort and longevity.

products.name: Silent Forest Yoga Mat
products.description: An eco-friendly yoga mat with a serene forest design.
products.longDescription: Find your center with the Silent Forest Yoga Mat. Made from natural tree rubber and a microfiber top layer, it offers excellent grip that increases as you sweat. The calming forest print helps you connect with nature and deepen your practice.

products.name: Data Stream Coffee Mug
products.description: A ceramic mug with a heat-sensitive data stream design.
products.longDescription: Watch the data flow as you pour your hot beverage into the Data Stream Coffee Mug. The heat-sensitive coating reveals a complex, glowing circuit pattern. It's the perfect mug for coders, tech enthusiasts, and coffee lovers alike.

products.name: Twilight Reverie Loungewear Set
products.description: An incredibly soft and comfortable loungewear set.
products.longDescription: Experience ultimate comfort with the Twilight Reverie Loungewear Set. Made from a brushed modal fabric, it feels luxuriously soft against the skin. The relaxed fit and elegant design make it perfect for unwinding at home in style.

products.name: Little Explorer Kids' Watch
products.description: A durable and fun watch to help kids learn to tell time.
products.longDescription: The Little Explorer Kids' Watch is designed to be both fun and educational. With clearly labeled 'To' and 'Past' sections on the face and color-coded hands, it makes learning to tell time a breeze. It's also splash-proof and has a durable strap, ready for any adventure.

products.name: Chronosplitter Chronometer
products.description: A precision timepiece for those who value detail.
products.longDescription: The Chronosplitter Chronometer is a masterpiece of engineering. Its automatic movement is visible through an exhibition case back, showcasing the intricate mechanics. A sapphire crystal and stainless steel case ensure it can withstand the rigors of daily life.

products.name: Architectural Lines Dress Shirt
products.description: A sharp, modern dress shirt with a unique linear pattern.
products.longDescription: Make an impression with the Architectural Lines Dress Shirt. The crisp, high-quality cotton is woven with a subtle geometric pattern that adds depth and character. A slim fit and concealed button placket create a clean, contemporary silhouette.

products.name: Megastructure Art Print
products.description: A high-quality art print of a vast, futuristic megastructure.
products.longDescription: Bring a sense of awe and wonder to your space with this stunning art print. Depicting a colossal futuristic megastructure against a dramatic sky, it's a piece that sparks the imagination. Printed on archival-quality paper with vibrant, fade-resistant inks.
